Package com.behreajj.camzup.core

Class MaterialUv

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.EntityData
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Material
com.behreajj.camzup.core.MaterialUv
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOriented2, ISpatial2, IVolume, IVolume2
Direct Known Subclasses:
MaterialPImage
public abstract class MaterialUv extends Material implements IOriented2, ISpatial2, IVolume2
An abstract material which holds data to display textured materials. Holds a transform that may be applied to UV coordinates. This class expects to be extended by a subclass that holds a given image implementation.
